author: m.kalinin
content: The lowest reasonable follow distance for the PoW chain seems to be `16` blocks. Which results in about `~40` blocks to finality in the best case if `Eth1Data` voting algorithm is changed in a way that it can come to consensus on a new portion of data within one epoch

author: sky.cactus
content: (so we come to consensus on Eth1Data in the *next* epoch)

author: m.kalinin
content: Not the next but within `64` epochs a per current spec. It would be `~2000` blocks

content: ü§î

content: Even 2000 block finality *greatly* reduces the risks of deep reorg attacks.
